name: Rally Commerce
tag_list: group-deals, group-commerce, ecommerce, eretailers, online-retailers, social-commerce
overview:
Rally Commerce provides online retailers with a â€œdo-it-yourselfâ€ deal commerce platform, and was designed to hand the power back to the merchants

The cloud-based platform enables the largest and fastest growing sector of all, the 200 billion dollar online retailer-driven ecommerce industry, to easily create, deliver, control, and profit from their own group buying and flash campaigns. The Rally Commerce platform offers simple deal creation, word of mouth social distribution, and comprehensive analytics, and was built specifically to meet the needs of top online retailers and brand leaders.

Based in San Francisco, and founded in 2011, Rally Commerce has a deep understanding of building enterprise grade products for top retailers and brands in social commerce, advertising and analytics.
